references.paper_title: Local graph partitioning using PageRank vectors
references.reason: This paper introduced Approximate Personalized PageRank (APPR), a foundational local algorithm for PPR vector approximation that the current paper builds upon.

references.paper_title: Variational perspective on local graph clustering
references.reason: This work provided a variational characterization of the PPR problem, which is crucial for the current paper's analysis and development of faster local methods.

references.paper_title: Accelerated and sparse algorithms for approximate personalized PageRank and beyond
references.reason: This recent paper proposed a nested subspace pursuit method for PPR approximation, offering a competitive baseline against which the current work is compared.
This paper provides a comprehensive overview of Personalized PageRank (PPR) and its applications, establishing the context and significance of the problem addressed.
This classic textbook provides the foundational mathematical background and algorithms for linear systems, particularly relevant for understanding the iterative solvers employed in the current work.
